sen.j: 宝ヶ池通（たからがいけどおり）は京都市の主要な東西の通りのひとつ。
sen.e: Takaragaike-dori Street is one of the main east and west street in Kyoto City.
Takaragaike-dori Street is a primary street running east-west through Kyoto City.
Takaragaike-dori Street is a primary street running east-west through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 左京区岩倉地域の幹線道路である。
sen.e: It's a highway in Iwakura, Sakyo-Ward area.
It is a highway in Iwakura, Sakyo-Ward area.
It is a highway in Iwakura, Sakyo Ward area.

sen.j: 白川通から幡枝地域まで。
sen.e: This street runs from Shirakawa-dori Street to Hated area.
The street runs from Shirakawa-dori Street to Hated area.
sen.cmt: Robert: Please check the reading for "Hated area"
sen.e: The street runs from Shirakawa-dori Street to Hateda area.

sen.j: 途中で南方に分岐し、狐坂をくだり北山通に接続する。
sen.e: It divides to south on the way, and goes down Kitsunezaka, and then connects to the Kitayama-dori Street.
On the way it diverges south, and goes down Kitsunezaka, and then connects to Kitayama-dori Street.
On the way it diverges south, and goes down Kitsunezaka, and then connects to Kitayama-dori Street.

sen.j: 岩倉地域の直線区間ではマンションや商店が建ち並ぶ他、地下鉄国際会館駅や、国立京都国際会館がある。
sen.e: There are many apartments and stores, also Kokusaikaikan Station and Kyoto International Conference Center at the section with straight line in Iwakura area.
There are many apartments and stores, as well as the Kokusaikaikan Station and Kyoto International Conference Center along a straight stretch of road in the Iwakura area.
There are many apartments and stores, as well as the Kokusaikaikan Station and Kyoto International Conference Center along a straight stretch of road in the Iwakura area.

sen.j: 白川通から分岐点までは片側2車線であるが、その先は片側1車線になる。
sen.e: There are 2 driveways on one side from Shirakawa-dori Street to a junction, but it will be 1 driveway on one side from there.
There are 2 lanes on each side from Shirakawa-dori Street until it reaches the junction, and from there on is a single lane road on each side.
There are two lanes on each side from Shirakawa-dori Street until it reaches the junction, and from there on is a single lane road on each side.

sen.j: 分岐側も宝ヶ池トンネルからは片側1車線となっている。
sen.e: There is one driveway on one side at the side of junction from Takaragaike Tunnel.
There is one lane on each side at the junction side from Takaragaike Tunnel.
There is one lane on each side at the junction side from Takaragaike Tunnel.

sen.j: 分岐し北山通へと通じる区間では、狐坂と呼ばれるヘアピンカーブの急な坂が存在していたが、2006年4月18日には狐坂高架橋が完成し、市街地から国際会館へ向かう際のルートとして便利なものとなった。
sen.e: At the section which connects to Kitayama-dori Street after a junction, there was a steep slope with Hairpin turn which was called Kitsunezaka, but the Kitsunezaka bridge was completed in April 18, 2006, it became a useful route to go to Kokusaikaikan from the city.

At the section which connects Kitayama-dori Street after a junction, there was a steep slope with hairpin turns, called Kitsunezaka, but the Kitsunezaka bridge was completed in April 18, 2006, and it became a useful route to the Kokusaikaikan from the city.

At the section which connects Kitayama-dori Street after a junction, there was a steep slope with hairpin turns, called Kitsunezaka, but the Kitsunezaka bridge was completed in April 18, 2006, and it became a useful route to the Kokusaikaikan from the city.

sen.j: なお、この高架橋の北側には五山の送り火の一つである妙法の「妙」の字があるため、橋桁を二割薄くするなどの景観対策がとられている。
sen.e: There is a letter of 'Myo' of Myoho which is one of the Gozen-nookuribi on the north side of this bridge, that's way it was measured to make a bridge 20% thinner for the view.
The letter of 'Myo' of Myoho which is one of the Gozen-nookuribi on the north side of this bridge, makes the bridge appear 20% thinner.
The letter of 'Myo' of Myoho which is one of the Gozan no Okuribi (Bonfires on Five Mountains) on the north side of this bridge, makes the bridge appear 20% thinner.
sen.cmt: 「五山の送り火」の表記を修正

tit.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更
